Pre-Game Insights: Die Mannschaft takes on Greece in a friendly before their Euro 2024 opener against Scotland.
Julian Nagelsmann has experienced a mixed start as Germany's coach, seeking a positive result to boost confidence.
Greece aims to overcome their Euro 2024 qualifying heartbreak in this friendly match.
Key players to watch include Florian Wirtz for Germany and Georgios Masouras for Greece.
Germany's head-to-head record against Greece is strong, with a 4-2 victory last time they met.
The match is crucial for Germany's preparation ahead of Euro 2024.
